channel.title: Forum Game Btooooooooooooooom(1/6)
channel.description:
##Welcome To the forum game called Btooom The idea is from a anime that Ive watched called, well, Btooom In the game you basically get bombs and blow people up Timing and planning is needed to get a kill
##Basic Mechenic 1.The attack weapon in this game are bombs and only bombs 2.You can either: throw a bomb into a room beside you or hide it in the room you are in currently. 3.Those bomb that were thrown out obviously will be noticed by anyone who enters 4.You can set the timer of the bomb to whichever round you want to bomb to explode 5.Everyone get 3 crackers at the start of the game 6.All bomb will explode on the start of the round, damaging all players inside 7.If the owner regret throwing the bomb, they can defuse it and take it back,Other player will have to use a defusal kit 8.There will be 6 players in a 5x5 arena
Star
Radar Everyone also have a radar that they can use at any time It reveals all player in a 2 room radius to you and you to them(anonymous) Unless the player use /hide(1 AP)(only hide from radar)
AP Everyone will get 5 AP at the start of each round, clears itself each round It is only for moving, hiding and searching room
Searching the room Each room takes 4 AP to search completely, But it's by progress For example you can search for 2AP this round and 2 next round. But it is individual for everyone Rooms restore every 10 rounds
How do you get bomb: By searching room, you get 2-4 bombs of random type depending on its rarity, and 1/3 chance to get a special item You can also loot dead player and get everything they have Also theres supply drop
Supply drop Every 3 rounds there will be an amount of supply drop depending on how many players there are You basically find lots of stuff in it without needing to search the room The coordinate of the supply drop will be announced in main thread
Health Problem Everyone have 2 HP Get hit by any bomb will decrease 1 HP The only way to replenish HP is by finding Health Kit
Items Bomb Type:
Cracker (normal) Incendiary (Lit the room on fire for the same amount of turns you set it to explode) Flyer (You can send it to anywhere on the map, moves 3 room per turn) Imploder (cannot set timer, instant kill) Mine (will only explode when people search this room, cannot throw) Trap (trap whoever comes in next in place for 1 round) Detonator (Explode when you choose to)
Special Item: Note, all are one use only Health Kit (replenish 1 HP) Catalyzer (increase 1 bombâ€™s explosion radius by 1 room)(can use more than 1 on a bomb) Defusal Kit (Defuse the bomb) Adranaline (Restore 1AP) Magnifying glass (get double the amount of bombs and doubles the chance to get special items next Search)(Can find out Mine) Bomb mold (Turn into a bomb type of your choice)
Armor:
Boots(Increase 1 max AP) Chest plate(Increase 1 max HP) Gloves(Increase 1 bomb per search) Helmet(Increase radar radius by 1) All armor can only be found in supply drop
Each round will be 24 hours until first contact, then it will expand to 48 hours or all actions are in But please, this is a fast pace game, so be active
Map: 1A 1B 1C 1D 1E 2A 2B 2C 2D 2E 3A 3B 3C 3D 3E 4A 4B 4C 4D 4E 5A 5B 5C 5D 5E
Poll: Do you want to have teams or FFA? Vote when you /join
Players: 1.Deadfrien Team
